description: '''Paisley Underground''' is a musical genre that originated in California. It was particularly popular in Los Angeles, reaching a peak in the mid-1980s. Paisley Underground bands incorporated [[psychedelic music|psychedelia]], rich vocal harmonies and guitar interplay, owing a particular debt to 1960s groups such as [[Love (band)|Love]] and [[the Byrds]], but more generally referencing a wide range of [[pop music|pop]] and [[garage rock]] revival.
